Dequantized(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when an erc20 token is fungized (erc1155 burned and erc20 tokens returned)

Quantized(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when an erc20 token is quantized (erc20 tokens tranferred to contract, erc1155 minted and transferred to quantizer)

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOf}. Requirements: - `account` cannot be the zero address.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

feeToken().details: Get the total supply for this quantized erc20

governanceToken().details: Get the total supply for this quantized erc20

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFeeToken(address).details: Get the total supply for this quantized erc20

setGovernanceToken(address).details: Get the total supply for this quantized erc20

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}. Time complexity O(1), guaranteed to always use less than 30 000 gas.

totalBalanceOf(address).details: Get the total balance of held for this erc20

totalSupply(address).details: Get the total existing supply of quantized tokens for this erc20

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

uri(uint256).details: Returns the metadata URI for this token type
